data.title: Area COdes of Sri Lanka
data.meta_description: Area COdes of Sri Lanka - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document lists the area codes for different regions in Sri Lanka along with the corresponding 3-digit codes. There are 25 area codes listed ranging from 011 for Colombo to 067 for Kalmunai. The area codes are grouped alphabetically from Ampara to Vavuniya and provide a simple mapping between region names and telephone codes in Sri Lanka.
